mapper.select: SELECT res_id resumeId,res_user_id resumeUserId,res_name resumeName, res_sex resumeSex,res_educ resumeEduc,res_expect_work resumeExpectWork, res_work_exper resumeWorkExper,res_project_exper resumeProjectExper, res_works_addr resumeWorksAddr,res_phone resumePhone,res_desc resumeDesc, res_work_year resumeWorkYear from resume where res_user_id = #{userId}
